name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Backend Developer with 10+ years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems, specializing in microservices architecture and cloud-native solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Spring Framework**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Git**, with hands-on experience in utilizing **AWS** (including **S3**, **Fargate**, and **Lambda**) for scalable application deployment. Demonstrated expertise in creating high-performing APIs and automation tools, complemented by a strong foundation in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask). Successfully contributed to high-impact projects at leading organizations, including VISA and Sii Poland, leveraging agile methodologies such as **Scrum** to enhance project delivery efficiency.

Led security assessments and integrated OAuth2 and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems, improving user access management by **25%**.
